thread.title: Japan’s latest idol group chants cryptocurrency choruses

title: Japan’s latest idol group chants cryptocurrency choruses
text:
Japan’s latest idol group chants cryptocurrency choruses 12:18pm EST - 00:55 
A Japanese pop group hopped on the bitcoin bandwagon on Friday (January 12), dedicating themselves to singing and dancing about the cryptocurrencies that have taken the world by storm this last year. Edward Baran reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A Japanese pop group hopped on the bitcoin bandwagon on Friday (January 12), dedicating themselves to singing and dancing about the cryptocurrencies that have taken the world by storm this last year. Edward Baran reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2ATGQlQ
